00015                          {
00016   static char s[4096];
00017   static char s1[512];
00018   lspmac_motor_t *mp;
00019   int i;
00020   int needComma;
00021   int gotone;
00022 
00023   needComma = 0;
00024   gotone = 0;
00025   s[0] = 0;
00026   strcpy(s, "select px.kvupdate('{");
00027 
00028   for( i=0; i<lspmac_nmotors; i++) {
00029     mp = &(lspmac_motors[i]);
00030 
00031     pthread_mutex_lock( &(mp->mutex));
00032     //
00033     // Bit 0 of lspg_initialized is 0 if we've not yet initialized the motor values via the DB
00034     // Bit 1 of lspg_initialized is 0 if we've not yet sent any update for this motor
00035     //
00036     // Never update if the database has not initialized the motor values
00037     // Then, always update if we've not done so yet
00038     // Then, only update if the current position has changed significantly
00039     //
00040     if( ((mp->lspg_initialized & 1) == 0) ||
00041         ((mp->lspg_initialized & 2) != 0) &&
00042         (fabs( mp->position - mp->reported_position) < mp->update_resolution)
00043         ) {
00044       pthread_mutex_unlock( &(mp->mutex));
00045     } else {
00046 
00047       gotone = 1;
00048       s1[0]=0;
00049 
00050       snprintf( s1, sizeof(s1)-1, mp->update_format, mp->position);
00051       s1[sizeof(s1)-1] = 0;
00052     
00053       if( mp->name != NULL && mp->status1_p != NULL && mp->status2_p != NULL && mp->actual_pos_cnts_p != NULL) {
00054         lslogging_log_message( "%s status1: %0x  status2: %0x  cnts: %d", mp->name, mp->status1, mp->status2, mp->actual_pos_cnts);
00055       }
00056 
00057       mp->reported_position = mp->position;
00058       mp->lspg_initialized |= 2;
00059       pthread_mutex_unlock( &(mp->mutex));
00060 
00061       if( strlen(s1) + strlen(s) + 32 >= sizeof( s)-1) {
00062         // send off update now and reset s
00063         strcat( s, "}'::text[])");
00064         lspg_query_push( NULL, s);
00065         
00066         lslogging_log_message( "Update: %s", s);
00067 
00068         s[0] = 0;
00069         strcpy( s, "select px.kvupdate('{");
00070         needComma = 0;
00071         gotone    = 0;
00072       }
00073 
00074       if( needComma)
00075         strcat( s, ",");
00076       else
00077         needComma=1;
00078 
00079       strcat( s, s1);
00080     }
00081   }
00082 
00083   if( gotone) {
00084     strcat( s, "}')");
00085     lspg_query_push( NULL, s);
00086 
00087     lslogging_log_message( "Update: %s", s);
00088   }
